category.name: Rich Client

preference.name: TC_ignore_case_on_search
preference.preference_description: Determines if object searches are case sensitive. Valid Values: 0 - Object searches are case sensitive. 1 - Mapped attribute searches and saved query searches are case insensitive when using an appearance set-based search engine (see ).Work part, engineering change, and workflow process searches are case insensitive when using the Context Definition pane in Design Context.
